Articles.Content:
I'm new here, been using KSP for a while. I know your basic stuff, rendevouz, circulize, transfer burn etc.

Currently doing Career mode with:

RemoteTech

B9 AeroSpace

MechJeb

Alarm Clock

Kw Rocketry

AIES Rocketry

KAS

Infernal Robotics

Space Shuttle Parts

Prop Monitor

Docking Port Alignment

Modular Kolonization System(I have no clue have this works)

Enhanced Nav Ball

TAC Life Support

6S Service Compartment.

Wow that's alot now that I look at it.

This is my first time being here, hoping the community is nice and I'll look here for any questions I have

Just made my first Relay network around kerbin , hoping to get one around the Mun.

Im looking for a way to make use of my future planned space station though, a way to generate science from it

Wow... all those mods make me look small... But then again some people have literally hundreds of mods...

Anyways, welcome! And you unfortunately can't generate a permanent science income from space stations, so all you really need is a few of each module.

Interstellar has a Time based lab that generates science depending on the stupidity of the kerbals and it's location.
